Uses of Class
Offer.Offer

  • Packages that use Offer 
    Package Description
    Application  
    Offer  
    User  

    • Uses of Offer in Application

      Fields in Application with type parameters of type Offer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Offer> Application.offers 
      Methods in Application that return types with arguments of type Offer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Offer> Application.getOffers()
      Return the list of Offer on the application.
      java.util.List<Offer> Application.searchBoughtOffers()
      Method that selects all the offers that are bought.
      java.util.List<Offer> Application.searchByDate(java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate)
      Method that selects all the offers that start between 2 given dates.
      java.util.List<Offer> Application.searchByRating(double rating)
      Method that selects the offers which have a rating equal or superior to the one given.
      java.util.List<Offer> Application.searchByType(int offerType)
      Method that selects all the offers with the given type (living or holiday).
      java.util.List<Offer> Application.searchByZIP(java.lang.String zip)
      Method that selects from all the offers the one with the given ZIP code.
      java.util.List<Offer> Application.searchReservedOffers()
      Method that selects all the offers that are reserved.
      java.util.List<Offer> Application.seeNonApprovedOffer()
      Method that selects from the offers array the ones that are not approved yet.
      Methods in Application with parameters of type Offer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Application.cancelOffer(Offer o)
      Method that is used by the host to cancel his own offer if it is not reserved or bought yet.

    • Uses of Offer in Offer

      Subclasses of Offer in Offer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HolidayOffer
      Class which implements a holiday offer, by adding an end date and a total price to Offer.
      class  LivingOffer
      Class which implements a living offer, by adding a price per month to Offer.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private java.util.List<Offer> RegisteredUser.createdOffers 
      Methods in User that return types with arguments of type Offer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Offer> RegisteredUser.seeHistory()
      Returns the entire list of offers a guest has reserved/bought.
      java.util.List<Offer> RegisteredUser.seeOffers()
      Returns the entire list of offers a host has created.
      Methods in User with parameters of type Offer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean RegisteredUser.addOffer(Offer o, int s)
      Adds an offer to a user's created or reserved/bought offers list, depending on the value of s.
      boolean RegisteredUser.removeOffer(Offer o, int s)
      Removes an offer from a user's created or reserved/bought offers list, depending on the value of s.
